translation: Having made pleasure and pain, gain and loss, victory and defeat equal, engage in battle for the sake of battle; thus, you shall not incur sin.
commentary: 2.38 pleasure and pain? Same same? doing having made? Profit and loss gain and loss? Jayajayo victory and defeat? Then then? for battle for battle? engage thou? Not not? Evam thus? Papam sin? avapsyasi shalt incur.Commentary This is the Yoga of eanimity or the doctrine of poise in action. If anyone does any action with the above mental attitude or balanced state of mind he will not reap the fruits
